body:
I'm terribly sorry, that's my fault:

pt should be 3/4 not 3/1

I got it right on my PC but somehow forgot to correct it on the board (thus it was still incorrect, when I copied it over to firemind)
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Higure, the Still Wind: pt incorrect
